alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 9:17PM CST until December 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique Near Basile. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor agricultural flood damage will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CST Monday was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 19.9 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Bayou Nezpique Basile 22.0 22.0 Mon 8 pm CST 21.3 20.7 20.4 &&
